name: Warlord

special_abilities.name: Indomitable (3/Day).
descriptions: The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

special_abilities.name: Survivor.
descriptions: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half its hit point maximum.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The warlord makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 it, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

legendary_action_description: The warlord can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The warlord regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Weapon Attack.
descriptions: The warlord makes a weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Command Ally.
descriptions: The warlord targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. if the target can see and hear the warlord, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary_actions.name: Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions).
descriptions: The warlord targets one enemy it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of warlord's next turn.
